group_1.textRight: Felicia just said she would be here soon.

group_1.textLeft: If she's gonna be late, she should at least call us.
Anyways, is it alright for Felicia to be playin' with us?
You and I aren't in the Union,
but Felicia's from Mikazuki Villa,@so she's right at the heart of it.

group_1.textRight: What do you think about it?
I think Yachiyo is the one who decided@on their policy,
and Felicia has the fighting power,@but she must not be as deeply involved...

group_1.textLeft: She's got her share, then!

group_1.textRight: Huh!? Uh...well...
Yeah, she's the right girl at the right place...!@I think, anyway...!?

group_1.textLeft: What's that supposed to mean...?

group_1.textRight: Um...that Felicia is better suited for fighting,@I suppose?
...I don't think she's in the right place for it now,@though...

group_1.textLeft: That thing about her mommy and daddy@Felicia was chalkin' about again?
I tellin' you it's just a dream.

group_1.textRight: But...she may be acting like she's fine,@but you can see that she's very tired...

group_1.textLeft: That...you're right about that, but y'know...

group_1.textRight: Felicia...

group_1.textLeft: Heey, Kako, do you know something?

group_1.textRight: Huh!?

group_1.textLeft: Felicia Mitsuki's parents are dead.
As a result of her own actions.

group_1.textRight: I-I don't know! I don't know, really!

group_1.textLeft: It's just a dream, but you're so worried about it.@It's reaaal weird!

group_1.textRight: Then you're not worried at all, Ayame...!?

group_1.textLeft: O-of course I'm worried about her too...!
I grew up as an abandoned kid at the Azalea House,
so I don't know my mommy or daddy, but...
When I think about the Director, I get really sad...
But it ain't like I can do anything sittin' and worrying over here!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
Yeah...I'm sure the only ones who could comfort her...@Are Felicia's parents...
No one else could ever replace them...

group_1.textLeft: Parents...
I got it, let's go listen to that story!

group_1.textRight: Huh!? What do you mean!? Who are we listening to!?

group_1.textLeft: FELICIA!

group_1.textRight: Huh? What's with you, shouting all of a sudden.
You tryin'a duel again!?

group_1.textLeft: Nope! Today, we're gonna find some ghosts!

group_1.textRight: We still got all day 'til nighttime.@Are you an idiot?

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat!? I'm worrying about you over here!

group_1.textRight: I dunno what the hell you mean!

group_1.textLeft: Come on, let's go over to Suichoku Temple!@Ghosts have been showin' up lately!

group_1.textRight: I know I heard a child talking about it@in the shopping district, but...
(I don't think that had anything to do with a ghost@at Suitoku Temple...)
